mapper.sql: assessment_id, indicators_id, unit_id, CREATED_USER, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_TIME, DEL
mapper.select: select count(*) from unit_assessment where detail_id in (select indicators_id from assessment_indicators where assessment_Year=#{assessmentYear})
select count(*) from unit_assessment where unit_id=#{unitId}

select count(*) from unit_assessment a left join assessment_indicators_detail b on a.detail_id=b.detail_id left join assessment_indicators c on c.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where a.unit_id=#{unitId} and c.assessment_year=#{year}

select a.*,c.indicators_id from unit_assessment a left join assessment_indicators_detail b on a.detail_id =b.detail_id left join assessment_indicators c on b.indicators_id=c.indicators_id where c.assessment_year=#{assessmentYear}

select count(c.assessment_id) from assessment_indicators a LEFT JOIN assessment_indicators_detail b on a.indicators_id=b.task_id LEFT JOIN assessment_indicators d on b.project_id=d.indicators_id LEFT JOIN unit_assessment c on c.detail_id=b.detail_id where a.unit_id=#{expertUnit} and c.unit_id=#{unitId} and d.evaluation_method=1

select sum(b.fraction) from unit_assessment a left join assessment_indicators_detail b on a.detail_id=b.detail_id left join assessment_indicators c on c.indicators_id=b.indicators_id where a.unit_id=#{unitId} and c.assessment_year=#{year}
